JOB DESCRIPTION: Software Developer: (C#    .Net WPF/WinForms SQL)    Job Type:   Full-time    Professional experience:   Minimum 5-7 years design and analysis experience using .NET technologies    Work Location:   Ahmedabad or Hyderabad at client location   Strong experience in application development using Microsoft Technologies.    Key Job Responsibilities/Skills:     .Net C Developer with SQL Server backend.     Strong background with C#, OOPS, Databases and SQL, WPF, WCF, Unity, Dependency Injection.     Sound Knowledge on OOPS concepts and hands-on on OOP.     Strong working knowledge on Microsoft SQL Server (procedures, triggers, views, functions).     Knowledge of SSIS and SSRS. Have to understand Windows Forms and Web-based user interfaces.     Strong skills in troubleshooting the code, problem-solving and critical thinking skills.     Strong communication skills and able to work effectively in a team environment.     Secondary  :    Agile Methodology.     Experience on SOA, WCF services.     Experience on DevOps and Cloud exposure will be plus.     Experience on AWS Cloud Services, Azure DevOps, .Net core, Microservices, Docker and Containerization will be plus.
